fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Stalwart (Day, Passive): Prevent the mastermind from being lynched, if the Mastermind would be lynched, the day will end and all day abilities on them will fail. You will die at the start of the next day.
- Guard (Night): Prevent a player from dying at night, kill the victim's attacker, they will appear to die to a Bodyguard.
